duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee the preparation of non-exempt and exempt multi-state payrolls, including computing wages, taxes, and deductions.
Supervise and support a team of Payroll Specialists, evaluate performance, and implement changes to improve productivity.
Maintain compliance with federal and state payroll laws, and ensure accurate reporting to government agencies and insurance carriers.
Manage payroll system applications such as Kronos Workforce Timekeeper and Windstar International Tax Navigator.
Reconcile general ledger and payroll liability accounts, prepare journal entries, and maintain audit controls for payroll information.
Collaborate with HR, Finance, and Business Computing departments to maintain payroll and timekeeping functions.
Perform year-end payroll tasks including W-2/W-2C/1099 processing and filing of various tax forms.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, Business or a related field
